3: ...Would you like to do it instead?
Then just shut up and wait. This is the fastest we can analyze without Liv.

This kind of Corrupted were bionic mechanoids called royal guards. They were created to work in the Cultural Restoration Exhibition Hall, responsible for showing different cultures and operating these projectors.
After the outbreak of the virus, M.I.N.D. technology's research was the priority.
This facility was converted into a M.I.N.D. laboratory, responsible for part of the research process.
These royal guards may not have their own M.I.N.D. systems installed, but they can still extract Construct consciousness from their M.I.N.D.s and upload it to some central consciousness container.
Just the one we encountered has already uploaded more than ten consciousness.
If we look at the pattern of the Corrupted so far, they should've destroyed the consciousness directly.
Hm... So we can only assume this is the work of external interference.
